name: Agent Jumper(Final)
description:
A 2D side scrolling platformer puzzle game. The player controls Agent Jumper and his mission is to escape the alternate reality he has been trapped in. The player must transverse through four levels filled with enemies and various obstacles trying to collect as many coins as possible utilizing his special wall jump. Each level is set in a different environment; haunted, winter, and lava. With each new level increasing in difficulty as the player travels farther in the alternate world. Can Agent Jumper escape or will be forever banished!
